T-Shirts & Tank Tops for Women

Abercrombie & Fitch has the ultimate collection of t-shirts and tank tops for women. In your favorite cuts, the softest fabrics, and every color under the sun, these layering pieces and standalone staples are the knits you need and want. When it comes to tees and tanks, there’s no such thing as “too many”, so find your favorites and stock up because our entire collection will complement everything in your wardrobe.

The perfect t-shirt is a must-have item, and Abercrombie & Fitch has the very best in store. From soft slub fabrics to vintage burnout effects and linen blends, the comfort levels are off the charts. We’ve got classic v-neck and scoop neck t-shirts as well as boyfriend tees and henleys, with both short-sleeve and long-sleeve options. We also offer dolman sleeves, crop top styles, off the shoulder details, and more with new half moon hems, neckband details, and deeper v-neck cuts. We’ve got striped patterns and solids in classic colors like black, white, and heather grey as well as newer shades of olive green and indigo. With vintage washes, our womens t-shirts have that pre-loved feeling, as if you’ve been wearing it for years. Kind of like your favorite jeans which, by the way, are the perfect match for any t-shirt design, so check out our collection of womens jeans to create the ultimate casual look. More ways to nail the jeans-and-t-shirt style? Our graphic tees make a statement and our womens polos are a forever favorite. Going the sleeveless route? Our selection of tank tops for women includes muscle tanks, swing tanks, and more. In ribbed cotton, jersey knits, and soft stretch fabrics, you’re sure to want them all. Pair them with our womens shorts for a warm weather look that never fails. If you’re looking for a more fitted alternative, try our collection of womens bodysuits.

Our tees and tanks come in sizes ranging XXS to XL, so we have the sizes you need and the styles you love in fabrics you can’t resist.
